title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936
medium: Pen and black, red ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: COUPE; lower right: J.P./36/1.; center right: TUBES; in graphite at top line of base: X; upper left: 5h lundi. mardi.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Cup drawn in elevation decorated on each side with an applied flange comprised of four tubes. Raised on a trapezoidal base drawn in red ink probably to be executed in wood.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936.
1936. Pen and black, red ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-20.
